Uses of Class
com.github.protobufel.grammar.ProtoFiles.Builder

    • Uses of ProtoFiles.Builder in com.github.protobufel.grammar

      Methods in com.github.protobufel.grammar that return ProtoFiles.Builder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ProtoFiles.Builder ProtoFiles.Builder.addFiles(File rootDir, String... protoFiles)
      Adds source .proto files, based on the rootDir.
      ProtoFiles.Builder ProtoFiles.Builder.addFilesByGlob(File baseDir, String globPattern)
      Adds source .proto files, by glob pattern, for processing.
      ProtoFiles.Builder ProtoFiles.Builder.addFilesByRegex(File rootDir, Pattern pattern)
      Adds source .proto files, by regex pattern, for processing.
      ProtoFiles.Builder ProtoFiles.Builder.addProto(DescriptorProtos.FileDescriptorProto proto)
      Adds a source proto to be processed.
      ProtoFiles.Builder ProtoFiles.Builder.addProtos(Iterable<DescriptorProtos.FileDescriptorProto> protos)
      Adds source protos to be processed.
      ProtoFiles.Builder ProtoFiles.Builder.addResources(URI rootURI, String... uris)
      Adds .proto resources, based on the rootURI.
      ProtoFiles.Builder ProtoFiles.Builder.addSource(String protoName, String source)
      Adds a source proto to be processed; protoName must be unique.
      ProtoFiles.Builder ProtoFiles.Builder.clearRegistry()
      Clears the user supplied ExtensionRegistry used to resolve the custom options into extensions.
      static ProtoFiles.Builder ProtoFiles.newBuilder()
      Returns a new Builder with its defaults set to DefaultErrorStrategy and console error printing.
      static ProtoFiles.Builder ProtoFiles.newBuilder(ErrorListeners.IBaseProtoErrorListener errorListener)
      Returns a new Builder with its defaults set to DefaultErrorStrategy and the supplied errorListener.
      static ProtoFiles.Builder ProtoFiles.newFailFastBuilder(ErrorListeners.IBaseProtoErrorListener errorListener)
      Returns a new Builder with its defaults set to BailErrorStrategy and the supplied errorListener.
      ProtoFiles.Builder ProtoFiles.Builder.setCustomOptionsAsExtensions(boolean customOptionsAsExtensions)
      sets whether the custom options will be resolved to extensions, or presented as unknown fields.
      ProtoFiles.Builder ProtoFiles.Builder.setRegistry(ExtensionRegistry registry)
      Supplies the ExtensionRegistry used to resolve the custom options into extensions.
      ProtoFiles.Builder ProtoFiles.Builder.setShowCircularTwice(boolean showCircularTwice)
      Sets whether to report circular dependency error twice for related dependencies; false by default.
      ProtoFiles.Builder ProtoFiles.Builder.setShowExistingNonCircular(boolean showExistingNonCircular)
      Sets whether to report a dependency on existing but not resolvable proto; false by default.
